https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8bLPdUEJsajYWwn9IGIZZm2BXyf.jpg Two friends who are partners in home video production see an opportunity to make money in an eco-friendly video contest. In the process their interests clash when they encounter the real problem of the global ecological imbalance: greed. Chirripó
